page.title: 11SELSEY REST HOMES PT.2
page.content:
The{owner}of the home we visited had turned her own home into a rest home 3 years ago and now lives in a newly built house standing in the same grounds.Just recently she had a new part built so that she can now take in {sick patients. { { Sheltered Accommodation }
{ The Rookery}is one of Selsey's rented sheltered accommodation for the elderly. It consists of{37 flats}which are owned by the{Downland Housing {Society.}There are 44 elderly residents in their 70s and 80s, including 3 married couples,and more women than men. About half of the residents come from Selsey and the others from places like London.They have a{warden}who is{on call}24 hours a day.
